title: with lots of new entrants
extract: Threat of New Entrants Definition. In Porters five forces, threat of new entrants refers to the threat new competitors pose to existing competitors in an industry. Therefore, a profitable industry will attract more competitors looking to achieve profits.Jul 24, 2013
extract_html: Threat of New Entrants Definition. In Porters five forces, threat of new entrants refers to the threat new competitors pose to existing competitors in an industry. Therefore, a profitable industry will attract more competitors looking to achieve profits.Jul 24, 2013
